document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu plans to use a visit to britain and france to portray palestinian president mahmoud abbas's unity deal with hamas islamists as a blow to already dim prospects for peace.
document.title: hamas unity bid on netanyahu's europe agenda
